main.name: Sandeep Kumar Misra
main.description: Versatile Senior Software Developer with more than 4 years of experience with production-level projects and interacting with international clients - The Hershey, Metro Systems, and Mondelez International
main.bio: Hi Viewer this is Sandeep, I'm a Software Developer. Currently, I'm working at VIS Technology while also mentoring my colleagues. A self-directed leader with talent at cultivating a collaborative and supportive team environment. I enjoy being challenged and engaged with projects that require me to work beyond my comfort and knowledge set, as I get to explore and learn new languages with different development techniques which are important for growth of any professional like me as well as the success of any organisation.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: My proficiency in technologies that I used while developing production level applications

testimonials.text: Sandeep has been a very hard working and dependable developer. He understands the business requirements and goes extra mile to deliver it. Highly professional and great value add to any team.
